description: Polyester fabric substrate from the Bamboo Rug.
short desc: Fabric substrate from the Bamboo Rug.
source: Samples cut from a 2 ft x 3 ft rug

measured property.test description: Mass loss rate [kg/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.

derived property.test description: Effective heat of combustion [MJ/kg] is calculated from data collected in micro-scale combustion calorimeter experiments.

derived property.test name: melting temperature and enthalpy of melting
